thread.section_title: Greenvelope.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greenvelope.com | greenvelope.com
thread.title: Dona Rae Warner
thread.title_full: Greenvelope.com reviewed by Dona Rae Warner

author: Dona Rae Warner
title: Dona Rae Warner
text: I initially designed a Save the Date card and decided to go right for the invitation. Customer Service assisted me to make the change and most of the editing tools are user friendly. The only issue I had was when I imported the contacts, those with two names and one email were counted as one, so it messed up my count, but I was able to make the change and monitor it going forth. I like all the follow up features and tracking. Will definitely come back again!
